title: Paper chromatography - conclusion for dyes X and Y

content.question: In a paper chromatography experiment, a sample of a pigment is separated into two components, X and Y, as shown in the figure above. The surface of the paper is moderately polar. What can be concluded about X and Y based on the experimental results?

choices.label: X has a larger molar mass than Y does.
Y has a larger molar mass than X does.
X is more polar than Y.
Y is more polar than X.

content.answer: Y is more polar than X.

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
